body.name: BOHON Desk Lamp, LED Desk Lamp with USB Charging Port, Wireless Charger Desk Light for Home Office, 5 Colors 6 Levels Brightness, Touch Table Lamp for Bedroom Bedside College Dorm Reading, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 1 min
features: 💡💡【Convenient USB Charging Port & 12W Fast Wireless Charger】The desk lamp has a built-in 5V/2.1A USB charging port output on the lamp base. The wireless charger is compatible with the QI charging standard, up to 12W, and is suitable for devices with wireless charging capabilities. Such as iPhone, Samsung and many more smart phones with wireless charging. The charger and desk lamp are powered separately, and the light of the lamp will not be affected when charging the mobile device.

💡💡【5 Color Temperature & 6 Brightness Levels】 The LED desk lamp has 5 lighting modes (2700K-6000K, from warm to white). Each lighting mode has 6 brightness dimming levels. Totally 30 illumination modes to meet all your requirements. You can choose the most comfortable light to work, study, read, or relax. Durable flexible gooseneck allows you to adjust your desk lamp with ease and to direct the light wherever you want.

💡💡【Touch Control & Memory Function】 The brightness and temperature of the architect's desk lamps are easily adjustable with the frontal touch-sensitive buttons. The lamp’s memory function retains preset settings and reboots accordingly. Simple, lightweight, and perfect for back-to-school season and dorm room essentials.

💡💡【Best Lighting Quality and Professional Eye Care】BOHON office desk lamp is made of high quality 60 LED chips, focusing on eye protection technology. No flicker, no glare, no ghosting, soft light, can protect your eyesight and reduce eye fatigue. The lamp beads last up to 50,000 hours and are up to 90% more energy efficient than traditional ones, so you don't have to worry about frequent replacements and wasting money.

💡💡【High Quality Metal Table Lamp with 12V High-performance Adapter】Featured with heavy-duty rugged metal lamp shade and base, durable and aesthetic. Super sturdy metal construction ensures its reliability. Anti-slip pad is firmly attached to the surface of the bottom. Our desk lamp come with a 12V/2A adapter(Worth $ 15), which is safer and more reliable than other adapter.

More application scenarios, waiting for you to discover. Why Choose BOHON LED Desk Lamp? Ideal Flicker-Free Light A contemporary take on a lighting classic. Designed to emit a soft, stable, non-flickering wash of light that’s friendly on your eyes, helping you avoid eye fatigue caused by flickering light and harsh glare. Smart Memory Function Keep the power connected, it can remember the brightness and lighting mode which you last set, you do not need to readjust it when you turn it on next time. Touch Control & Anti-slip Panel Touch dimming can be adjusted freely, with quick response. The wireless charging panel with anti-slip design can better hold the phone. Adjustable Angle Effortlessly adjust the lamp as you wish. High-Performance Wireless Charger The 12w desk lamp comes with a 12V/2A adapter (not general 5V adapter), which makes the power output more stable and safe, the energy conversion efficiency is higher, and the charging is faster. What You Get？ 1 x LED Desk lamp1 x Power Adapter 12V 2A1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for price
reviews.reviewText: At first when looking into buying a lamp for my desk, I wanted a wireless one for reading. But I found myself buying this one. I've been using this lamp for a few months now and the only issue with it is that the wireless phone charger is not the greatest. However the lamp its self is great, it has four colors modes which gives it some variety and five different brightness levels which I love to use for reading or working at my desk. And my favorite part about this lamp is that the stem to the lamp is very flexible for all my working needs. price 10/10, quality so far 10/10 and for space consumption 9/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Such convenient phone charging.
reviews.reviewText: The lamps are very stylish, they have a good heavy base so it would be difficult to knock them over. I love being able to charge my phone on the pad, there is also a plug in point for a USB cable. The light can be dimmed very easily. These lamps are great for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: it is durable and the light is likable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is just right for the right price. It charges my phone. Its great to be able to adjust the brightness of the light and range of the neck. no bulb to change out. I recommend it and will probably buy another

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is fantastic. I love the shape, the features and the brightness. It is adjustable and you can select different temps of light to get it just how you want. Another great feature is the phone charging abilities. I'm considering ordering another for my home office!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy! Stopped working within a month
reviews.reviewText: DO NOT BUY!!The lamp was awesome when I got it. USB port, wireless charging, multiple light settings & it looks good too! I used it for 5 days in my home office, was away from home for 2 weeks, came back and it doesn't work. The cable & transformer work but not the lamp. I would have got more usage out of one charge of my head torch.Now I can't return it without the original package. WASTE OF MONEY! And not to mention that it will end up in a dump site after a few hours of usage, all that materials, labor, transportation because the vendor wanted to sell a crappy product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the clean look and touch controls!
reviews.reviewText: I really liked this little desk light. It is simple and stylish, and has fantastic touch controls! I tried really hard to keep it, placing it in several locations and living with it for a while.For my desk area, it was fantastic for everyday work. It failed at being bright enough (more lumens) for project work. (It was such a great price for the style and features, I was thinking about keeping it and buying a second portable project light, that I could hide when not needed.)I also found it to be a bit short. I preferred something taller. While this wasn't a deal breaker for my desk area, it was a problem for my nightstand where I tried it out next.My nightstand is a bit distant from the bed, so the gooseneck wasn't long enough to bend and get a nice angle when reading in bed.I also discovered a concern with the built-in wireless charger. It would produce an above average amount of heat and there was an audible buzz or ring when charging my phone. I decided not to use it at all. (At my nightstand location, this was not a big problem, as I prefer to use wireless chargers for trickle charging and prefer to plug in overnight.)Lastly, I liked the USB pass through on the side of the base. Some have them on top, which I find to be a little messing looking.I did end up returning it, but I would strongly encourage people that are considering this lamp, to give it a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect task lamp for my desk. Quick delivery and solid quality
